metadata.description: Signed: Louis, et plus bas, par le roi, de Saint-Priest. Vu au conseil, Lambert
Vignette of French royal arms supported by trumpet-playing angels at head of title; another edition exists with vignette of crowned royal orb, scepter, and hand of justice on draped weapons
Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
metadata.notes: No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Title on cover page. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Only one numbered page.
